articles.author: Ritu Sharma
articles.title: Russia Flaunts ‘Magic Radio’ To Shield Its FVP Drones From Jamming, Thwart Electronic Warfare Attacks - EurAsian Times
articles.description: The Russia-Ukraine war has proved to be a breeding ground for electronic warfare. Russia claims to have developed a ‘magic radio’ for FPV (First Person View) drones that will make them highly resistant to jamming in the latest technological development for dr…
